column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////i LOVE cafe babareba - especially the delicious paella! the sangria is great too
column2: with seasonal flavors. the only thing i don't like is the immensely
column4: long wait time! i sat there with my friend for two hours waiting for a table. reservation is definitely recommended
column5: but there is still about a half hour wait with reservation.
